name: Broadtrip
storyline:
Moms always get the short end of the stick in rpgs. They're usually either dead or generic npcs that hang out in the hero's house.

But not here, this is Broadtrip.

One summer Dr. Lassie Lunaris takes a patient on a road trip in an RV across the world. However, this vacation isn't all fun and games, as the two will have several challenges and problems to sort out along the way.
